title.rendered: Amb. Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa met with the Deputy Foreign Minister of Vietnam, Amb Nguyen Minh Hang

content.rendered:
The Permanent Secretary also met with the Deputy Foreign Minister of Vietnam, Amb Nguyen Minh Hang, on the sidelines of the ongoing Antalya Diplomacy Forum (ADF). The two officials reviewed the bilateral relations between Nigeria and Vietnam and resolved to work together, with a commitment to strengthen cooperation across various sectors.
The Permanent Secretary was accompanied by Ambassador Zayyad Abdulsalam, CDA a.i. Embassy of Nigeria, Türkiye.
